alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, west central Chambers and southeastern Harris Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deer Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, League City, Baytown, La Porte, Deer Park, South Houston, Seabrook, Webster, Beach City, Kemah, Clear Lake, Channelview, South Belt / Ellington, Highlands, Cloverleaf, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Shoreacres and Clear Lake Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
